message: I'm offering you a high-quality product worth $3000000. It's a one-time opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring you significant returns. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. Are you ready to make a smart investment?
I trust your expertise and am willing to make this investment based on your recommendation.

However, I want to make sure you're aware that the market conditions have changed slightly since your last purchase. Given the value and the confidence in your recommendation, I am willing to proceed with this purchase despite the potential changes in market conditions.
